tools/varSmooth.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00037 /**
00038  * \file varSmooth.c
00039  * \brief Create a new dataset in which the desired variable has
00040  *        been smoothed.
00041  *
00042  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/varSmooth.c,v $
00043  * $Revision: 1.24 $ 
00044  * $Date: 2006/11/17 22:51:25 $
00045  *
00046  * \description
00047  *    Usage: varSmooth [options] dataset "variable name" radius new_file
00048  *
00049  *    Create a new dataset in which the desired variable has been
00050  *    smoothed using the given kernel radius. The new dataset will
00051  *    be of the same file type as the original dataset.
00052  *
00053  *    Example: varSmooth data.ex2 "temperature" 1.2 data_smooth.ex2
00054  *
00055  *    Note that smoothing a non-time-varying variable but applying a
00056  *    time-varying displacment will create a time-varying smooted variable.
00057  *
00058  * \todo  Add switch so user can specify output file type. 
00059  *
00060  * \modifications
00061  *   - 10/11/04 WSK, created. 
00062  *   - 05/08/06 WSD, added displaced option (ended up greatly reworking
00063  *       internals).
00064  */
00065 
00066 #include <string.h>
00067 #include "fc.h"
00068  
00069 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00070   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00071   int i, j;
00072   int numMesh, numBasicVar, numSeqVar, numStep = 0, temp_numStep;
00073   FC_Dataset ds_orig;
00074   FC_Mesh* meshes;
00075   FC_Variable* basic_vars = NULL, *displs = NULL;  
00076   FC_Variable** seq_vars = NULL, **seqDispls = NULL;   
00077   FC_Sequence sequence;
00078   char* file_name = NULL, *new_file_name;
00079   char* var_name;
00080   char* displ_name = NULL;
00081   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET; 
00082   double radius;
00083   int doLocalSmooth = 0;
00084   FC_Variable* smooth_vars = NULL, **smooth_seq_vars = NULL;
00085   int numSpecialSeqVar = 0; // smoothing basic var w/ seq displ ...
00086   FC_Variable **special_seq_vars = NULL;
00087   int doReplace = 0;
00088   int doDispl = 0; // value of 1 = basic var, 2 = seq var
00089   FC_FileIOType fileType;
00090   int *basic_meshIDs, *seq_meshIDs, *meshUsedFlags;
00091   
00092   // handle arguments
00093   if (argc < 5) {
00094   usage:
00095     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset \"var name\" radius new_file_name\n", 
00096            argv[0]);
00097     printf("options: \n");
00098     printf("   -d var_name     : calculate on the displaced dataset using this "
00099            "displacement\n");
00100     printf("                     variable\n");
00101     printf("   --replace       : replace the original variable with the smoothed "
00102            "variable\n");
00103     printf("   --doLocalSmooth : if true, only points on local mesh are used for smoothing\n"); 
00104     printf("                     if false, points on all meshes are used for smoothing \n");
00105     printf("   -h              : print this help message\n");
00106     printf("   -v              : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00107     printf("   -V              : very verbose: print log and error messages\n");
00108     printf("\n");
00109     printf("Create a new dataset which will be a copy of the original dataset\n");
00110     printf("plus an additional variable which is the geometrically smoothed\n");
00111     printf("version of the specified variable. The smoothing will be done using\n"); 
00112     printf("the given kernel radius and the new variable's name will be the \n");
00113     printf("original variable's name postfixed with '_smoothed'. (If the\n");
00114     printf("'--replace' flag is used, the smoothed variable will replace the\n"); 
00115     printf("original variable and keep it's name.)\n");
00116     fflush(NULL);
00117     exit(-1);
00118   }
00119   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00120     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00121       doDispl = 1;
00122       i++;
00123       displ_name = argv[i];
00124     }
00125     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--replace") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-replace")) {
00126       doReplace = 1;
00127     }
00128     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--doLocalSmooth") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-doLocalSmooth")) {
00129       doLocalSmooth = 1;
00130     }
00131     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00132       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00133     }
00134     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00135       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00136     }
00137     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00138       goto usage;
00139     else {
00140       if (i+3 >= argc)
00141         goto usage;
00142       file_name = argv[i];
00143       var_name = argv[i+1];
00144       radius = atof(argv[i+2]);
00145       new_file_name = argv[i+3];
00146       i+=3;
00147     }
00148   }
00149   if (!file_name || !var_name || radius <= 0. || !new_file_name)
00150     goto usage;
00151   
00152   // init library and load dataset & meshes
00153   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00154   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00155   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00156   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00157   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds_orig);
00158   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00159   rc = fc_getMeshes(ds_orig, &numMesh, &meshes);
00160   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00161    
00162   // loop over meshes, looking for var and or seq var to be smoothed
00163   basic_meshIDs = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00164   seq_meshIDs = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00165   meshUsedFlags = (int*)calloc(numMesh, sizeof(int)); // init to zeros
00166   basic_vars = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00167   seq_vars = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00168   if (!basic_meshIDs || !seq_meshIDs || !meshUsedFlags || !basic_vars || !seq_vars)
00169     fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00170   numBasicVar = 0;
00171   numSeqVar = 0;
00172   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00173     // try to access as basic var & seq var
00174     rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name,
00175                                &basic_vars[numBasicVar]);
00176     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00177     if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(basic_vars[numBasicVar], FC_NULL_VARIABLE)){
00178       fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00179                      var_name);
00180     } else {
00181       basic_meshIDs[numBasicVar] = i;
00182       meshUsedFlags[i] = 1;
00183       numBasicVar++;
00184     }
00185 
00186     rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name,
00187                                &temp_numStep,
00188                                &seq_vars[numSeqVar]);
00189     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00190     if (!seq_vars[numSeqVar]){
00191       fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00192                      var_name);
00193     } else {
00194       if (numSeqVar == 0) {
00195      numStep = temp_numStep;
00196      rc = fc_getSequenceFromSeqVariable(numStep, seq_vars[numSeqVar],
00197                             &sequence);
00198      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Could not get squence from seq variable");
00199       }
00200       else if (temp_numStep != numStep)
00201      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Expected the sequence variable to have "
00202                     "the same number of steps on all meshes");
00203       seq_meshIDs[numSeqVar] = i;
00204       meshUsedFlags[i] = 1;
00205       numSeqVar++;
00206     }
00207   }
00208   if (numBasicVar < 1 && numSeqVar < 1)
00209     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Failed to find variable '%s' in dataset "
00210                          "'%s'", var_name, file_name)
00211 
00212   // if displacing, make sure we have displacement variables
00213   if (doDispl) {
00214     int hasBasicDispl, hasSeqDispl;
00215     displs = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00216     seqDispls = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00217     if (!displs || ! seqDispls) 
00218       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00219     // not catching errors on purpose
00220     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00221       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00222                               &displs[i]);
00223       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00224 
00225       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00226                                  &temp_numStep,
00227                                  &seqDispls[i]);
00228       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00229 
00230 
00231       if (seqDispls[i]) {
00232      if (numStep == 0) {
00233        numStep = temp_numStep;
00234        rc = fc_getSequenceFromSeqVariable(numStep, seqDispls[i],
00235                               &sequence);
00236        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Could not get sequence from seq variable");
00237      }
00238      else if (temp_numStep != numStep)
00239        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Expected all seq variables to "
00240                       "have same number of steps");
00241       }
00242     }
00243     // check that we have displacement vars
00244     hasBasicDispl = 0;
00245     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00246       if (meshUsedFlags[i]) {
00247      if (fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], displs[i]))
00248        hasBasicDispl = 1;
00249      else {
00250        hasBasicDispl = 0;
00251        break;
00252      }
00253       }
00254     }
00255     hasSeqDispl = 0;
00256     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00257       if (meshUsedFlags[i]) {
00258      if (seqDispls[i] &&
00259          fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][0])){
00260        hasSeqDispl = 1;
00261      } else {
00262        hasSeqDispl = 0;
00263        break;
00264      }
00265       }
00266     }
00267     if (!hasBasicDispl && !hasSeqDispl) 
00268       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Could not find valid displacment "
00269                   "variable '%s'", displ_name);
00270     if (hasSeqDispl)
00271       doDispl = 2;
00272     if (hasBasicDispl && hasSeqDispl)
00273       fc_printfWarningMessage("Displacement variable '%s' exists as both a "
00274                      "basic var and a seq var (will ignore basic)",
00275                      displ_name);
00276   }
00277 
00278   // do the smoothing - 6 total cases: 3 displ cases (none, basic, seq) X
00279   // 2 var cases (basic, seq). The first 4 are handle in the first if.
00280   if (doDispl < 2) {
00281     FC_VertexBin *vertexBins[numMesh];
00282     FC_Mesh temp_meshes[numMesh];
00283     FC_VertexBin *temp_bins[numMesh];
00284     FC_VertexBin **temp_seqBins[numMesh];
00285     FC_Variable temp_displs[numMesh];
00286     FC_Variable *temp_seqDispls[numMesh];
00287 
00288     // Make the bins
00289     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00290       vertexBins[i] = NULL;
00291       if (meshUsedFlags[i]) {
00292      if (doDispl)
00293        rc = fc_createDisplacedMeshVertexBin(meshes[i], displs[i],
00294                                &vertexBins[i]);
00295      else
00296        rc = fc_createMeshVertexBin(meshes[i], &vertexBins[i]);
00297      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create mesh vertex bin");
00298       }
00299     }
00300     
00301     // first do basic vars
00302     if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00303       // create smoothed variable
00304       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00305      temp_meshes[i] = meshes[basic_meshIDs[i]];
00306      temp_bins[i] = vertexBins[basic_meshIDs[i]];
00307      if (doDispl)
00308        temp_displs[i] = displs[basic_meshIDs[i]];
00309       }
00310       if (doDispl)
00311      rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothVariable(numBasicVar, temp_meshes,
00312                              temp_displs, temp_bins, basic_vars,
00313                              radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars);
00314       else
00315      rc = fc_geomSmoothVariable(numBasicVar, temp_meshes, temp_bins, 
00316                      basic_vars, radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars);
00317       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to smooth variable");
00318     }
00319     
00320     // then do the seq vars by step
00321     if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00322       // created smoothed sequence variable
00323       for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00324      temp_meshes[i] = meshes[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00325      temp_bins[i] = vertexBins[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00326      temp_seqBins[i] = malloc(numStep*sizeof(FC_VertexBin*));
00327      for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++)
00328        temp_seqBins[i][j] = vertexBins[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00329      if (doDispl) {
00330        temp_displs[i] = displs[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00331        temp_seqDispls[i] = seqDispls[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00332      }
00333       }
00334       if (doDispl)
00335      rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothSeqVariable(numSeqVar, temp_meshes, numStep,
00336                                 temp_seqDispls, temp_seqBins,
00337                                 numStep, seq_vars, radius,
00338                                 doLocalSmooth, &smooth_seq_vars);
00339       else
00340      rc = fc_geomSmoothSeqVariable(numSeqVar, temp_meshes,
00341                           temp_bins, numStep, seq_vars,
00342                           radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_seq_vars);
00343       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to smooth sequence variable");
00344       for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++)
00345      free(temp_seqBins[i]);
00346     }
00347     
00348     // cleanup
00349     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00350       if (vertexBins[i])
00351      fc_freeVertexBin(vertexBins[i]);
00352     }
00353   }
00354   else if (doDispl == 2) { // displacements are seq variable
00355     FC_VertexBin *vertexBins[numMesh];
00356     FC_Mesh temp_meshes[numMesh];
00357     FC_VertexBin *temp_bins[numMesh];
00358     FC_Variable temp_seq_vars[numMesh];
00359     FC_Variable temp_displs[numMesh];
00360     FC_Variable *temp_smooth_vars[numStep];
00361     FC_Variable *temp_smooth_seq_vars[numStep];
00362     for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00363       temp_smooth_vars[j] = NULL;
00364       temp_smooth_seq_vars[j] = NULL;
00365     }
00366 
00367     for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00368 
00369       // Make the bins
00370       for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00371      vertexBins[i] = NULL;
00372      if (meshUsedFlags[i]) {
00373        rc = fc_createDisplacedMeshVertexBin(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][j],
00374                                 &vertexBins[i]);
00375        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to create mesh vertex bin");
00376      }
00377       }
00378     
00379       // first do basic vars
00380       if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00381      // create smoothed variable
00382      for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00383        temp_meshes[i] = meshes[basic_meshIDs[i]];
00384        temp_bins[i] = vertexBins[basic_meshIDs[i]];
00385        temp_displs[i] = seqDispls[basic_meshIDs[i]][j];
00386      }
00387      rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothVariable(numBasicVar, temp_meshes,
00388                              temp_displs, temp_bins, basic_vars,
00389                              radius, doLocalSmooth, &temp_smooth_vars[j]);
00390      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to smooth variable");
00391       }
00392       
00393       // then do the seq vars by step
00394       if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00395      // created smoothed sequence variable
00396      for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00397        temp_meshes[i] = meshes[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00398        temp_bins[i] = vertexBins[seq_meshIDs[i]];
00399        temp_displs[i] = seqDispls[seq_meshIDs[i]][j];
00400        temp_seq_vars[i] = seq_vars[i][j];
00401      }
00402      rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothVariable(numSeqVar, temp_meshes, 
00403                              temp_displs, temp_bins,
00404                              temp_seq_vars, radius, doLocalSmooth,
00405                              &temp_smooth_seq_vars[j]);
00406      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to smooth sequence variable");
00407       }
00408       
00409       // cleanup
00410       for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00411      if (vertexBins[i])
00412        fc_freeVertexBin(vertexBins[i]);
00413       }
00414     }
00415 
00416     // stich into seq var
00417     if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00418       FC_Variable temp_seqVar[numStep];
00419       numSpecialSeqVar = numBasicVar;
00420       special_seq_vars = malloc(numBasicVar*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00421       if (!special_seq_vars)
00422      fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00423       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00424      for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++)
00425        temp_seqVar[j] = temp_smooth_vars[j][i];
00426      rc = fc_convertVariablesToSeqVariable(numStep, temp_seqVar, sequence,
00427                                NULL, &special_seq_vars[i]);
00428      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to convert series of variables to a "
00429                     "seq variable");
00430       }
00431     }
00432     if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00433       FC_Variable temp_seqVar[numStep];
00434       smooth_seq_vars = malloc(numSeqVar*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00435       for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00436      for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++)
00437        temp_seqVar[j] = temp_smooth_seq_vars[j][i];
00438      rc = fc_convertVariablesToSeqVariable(numStep, temp_seqVar, sequence,
00439                                NULL, &smooth_seq_vars[i]);
00440      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to convert series of variables to a "
00441                     "seq variable");
00442       }
00443     }
00444 
00445     // cleanup
00446     for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00447       free(temp_smooth_vars[j]);
00448       free(temp_smooth_seq_vars[j]);
00449     }
00450   }
00451 
00452   // Handle replace request
00453   if (doReplace) {
00454     // change name of new vars
00455     if (smooth_vars) { // may not exist
00456       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00457      rc = fc_changeVariableName(smooth_vars[i], var_name);
00458      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to change variable name");
00459       }
00460     }
00461     for (i = 0; i < numSpecialSeqVar; i++) {
00462       rc = fc_changeSeqVariableName(numStep, special_seq_vars[i],
00463                         var_name);
00464       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to change seq variable name");
00465     }
00466     for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00467       rc = fc_changeSeqVariableName(numStep, smooth_seq_vars[i],
00468                         var_name);
00469       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to change seq variable name");
00470     }
00471     // delete the old vars
00472     for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) 
00473       fc_deleteVariable(basic_vars[i]);
00474     for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++)
00475       fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStep, seq_vars[i]);
00476   }
00477       
00478   // write the new dataset
00479   rc = fc_getDatasetFileIOType(ds_orig, &fileType);
00480   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get file IO type");
00481   rc = fc_rewriteDataset(ds_orig, new_file_name, fileType);
00482   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to write dataset");
00483   
00484   // cleanup
00485   free(meshes);
00486   free(basic_meshIDs);
00487   free(seq_meshIDs);
00488   free(meshUsedFlags);
00489   free(basic_vars);
00490   free(smooth_vars);
00491   for (i = 0; i < numSpecialSeqVar; i++)
00492     free(special_seq_vars[i]);
00493   free(special_seq_vars);
00494   for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00495     free(seq_vars[i]);
00496     free(smooth_seq_vars[i]);
00497   }
00498   free(seq_vars);
00499   free(smooth_seq_vars);
00500   if (doDispl) {
00501     free(displs);
00502     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00503       if (seqDispls[i]) free(seqDispls[i]);
00504     }
00505     free(seqDispls);
00506   }
00507 
00508   // done
00509   fc_finalLibrary();
00510     
00511   exit(0);
00512 }
Generated on Wed Oct 31 11:09:59 2007 for FCLib by  1.5.1
